item.title: 盈利迫在眉睫，期货承压；收益率上升
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货下跌，因为债券抛售推动国债收益率走高，对利率敏感的股票承压，而投资者则在等待大量的企业财报，以获得更明确的市场方向。【原文：U.S. stock index futures fell on Tuesday, as a selloff in bonds pushed Treasury yields higher, pressuring rate-sensitive stocks, while investors awaited a deluge of corporate earnings for a clearer market direction.】

item.title: 本田因高压燃油泵问题召回逾72.08万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，由于高压燃油泵可能破裂并泄漏燃油，本田公司将在美国召回超过72.08万辆汽车。【原文：Honda is recalling over 720,800 vehicles in the U.S. as a high pressure fuel pump may crack and leak fuel, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国 "光棍节 "销售节未能激发消费者热情
item.description: 中国最大的购物盛会正在进行中，但大多数商家和零售业分析师预计销售额将持平或最多不温不火地增长，因为消费者仍然对中国的经济困境感到非常沮丧。【原文：China's largest shopping event is underway but most merchants and retail analysts expect flat or at best, tepid sales growth, noting consumers are still very much dispirited by the country's economic woes.】

item.title: 美国监管机构公布消费者数据 "开放银行 "规则
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护最高监督机构周二公布了期待已久的规则，旨在推动向开放银行业务转变并刺激竞争，允许消费者在购买服务时控制和共享自己的数据。【原文：The top U.S. watchdog agency for consumer financial protection on Tuesday unveiled long-awaited rules intended to drive a shift toward open banking and spur competition, allowing consumers to control and share their own data when shopping for services.】

item.title: 泰国财政部长称 2024 年经济增长率可能达不到 3%，但 2025 年会达到
item.description: 泰国财政部长周二表示，泰国今年的经济增长率可能达不到 3%，但由于政府将加快投资，明年的经济增长率将超过 3%。【原文：Thailand's economic growth may not reach 3% this year but should come in above that level next year as the government will accelerate investment, the finance minister said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 高盛称在特朗普关税和减税政策下欧元可能下跌 10
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）表示，如果唐纳德-特朗普在 11 月 5 日的美国总统大选中获胜，他将大范围征收关税并削减国内税收，那么欧元的跌幅可能高达 10%，这意味着欧元将从目前的水平跌破 1 美元。【原文：Goldman Sachs has said the euro could fall as much as 10% - implying a drop below $1 from current levels - in a scenario in which Donald Trump imposes widespread tariffs and cuts domestic taxes if he wins the Nov. 5 U.S. presidential election.】

item.title: 首席执行官称，ASML 预计 2026 年实现增长，中美争端将持续下去
item.description: 领先的计算机芯片设备制造商ASML首席执行官周二表示，他预计2026年将是公司业绩增长的一年，美国政府将继续推动进一步限制其对华出口。【原文：The CEO of leading computer chip equipment maker ASML said on Tuesday he expects that 2026 will be a growth year for the company and that the U.S. government will continue to push for further restrictions on its exports to China.】

item.title: 切尼尔能源公司预计到 2040 年中国天然气需求将增长 50%以上
item.description: 切尼尔能源公司（Cheniere Energy）一位高管周二在亚洲天然气市场（Asia Gas Markets）会议上表示，预计到 2040 年，中国的天然气需求将从目前的 4000 亿立方米增长到 6000 亿立方米以上。【原文：Cheniere Energy expects China gas demand to grow to more than 600 billion cubic meters (bcm) by 2040 from 400 bcm today, a company executive said at the Asia Gas Markets conference on Tuesday.】

item.title: 大众汽车卡车部门特拉托第三季度业绩超预期，股价大涨
item.description: 本周二，大众汽车卡车部门公布的第三季度业绩超出预期，其美国品牌 International 和瑞典品牌斯堪尼亚销售强劲，带动特拉托公司股价上涨。【原文：Shares in Traton rose on Tuesday after Volkswagen's truck unit reported third-quarter results above expectations driven by robust sales in its US brand International and Swedish unit Scania.】

item.title: Mulberry 称 Frasers 修改后的收购方案站不住脚
item.description: 英国奢侈品牌 Mulberry 周二拒绝了迈克-阿什利（Mike Ashley）的 Frasers 集团提出的第二份收购建议，称该收购建议 "站不住脚"。【原文：British luxury brand Mulberry on Tuesday rejected a second takeover proposal from Mike Ashley's Frasers Group , saying the possible offer is "untenable".】

item.title: 假日酒店业主洲际酒店集团（IHG）的客房收入因欧洲夏季需求坚挺而增长 1.5
item.description: 假日酒店的所有者洲际酒店集团周二公布，第三季度客房收入增长了 1.5%，原因是欧洲的夏季需求抵消了美国市场的低迷和中国市场的疲软。【原文：Holiday Inn owner InterContinental Hotels Group posted third-quarter room revenue growth of 1.5% on Tuesday, as summer demand in Europe offset a subdued U.S. market and dogged weakness in China.】

item.title: 上调云计算业务展望后，SAP 股价早盘上涨 4.4
item.description: 在 Lang & Schwarz 周二的盘前交易中，SAP 股价上涨了 4.4%，此前这家德国软件公司因第三季度云计算业务强劲而上调了全年目标。【原文：Shares in SAP were up 4.4% in Lang & Schwarz pre-market trade on Tuesday after the German software company raised its full-year targets on strong cloud business in the third quarter.】

item.title: 西太平洋银行 24 财年净利润因重大项目减少 8,200 万美元
item.description: 澳大利亚市值排名第三的西太平洋银行周二表示，由于某些显著项目的影响，其 2024 年的净利润将受到 1.23 亿澳元（8226 万美元）的冲击。【原文：Westpac Banking Corp , Australia's third-largest lender by market value, said on Tuesday its 2024 net profit would take a A$123 million ($82.26 million) hit due to impacts from certain notable items.】

item.title: 萨博利润增长，销售增长达到预测范围上限
item.description: 瑞典防务材料制造商萨博公司周二公布的第三季度营业利润增幅略高于预期，并确认了随着各国争相重整军备，该公司今年销售额和利润将大幅增长的前景。【原文：Swedish defence material maker Saab on Tuesday reported a slightly bigger-than-expected rise in third-quarter operating earnings and affirmed its outlook for surging sales and profits this year as countries scramble to re-arm.】

item.title: Randstad 第三季度利润略高于预期
item.description: 全球最大的职业介绍所 Randstad 周二公布的季度利润略高于预期，原因是尽管宏观经济环境充满挑战，但部分市场的贸易状况趋于稳定。【原文：Randstad , the world's largest employment agency, on Tuesday reported quarterly profit slightly above expectations as trading conditions stabilized across some of its markets despite a challenging macroeconomic environment.】

item.title: 股票基准飙升，投资者逃离主题 ETF
item.description: 投资者正在离开与人工智能和视频游戏等特定主题挂钩的交易所交易基金，而涌向与屡创新高的广泛股市基准挂钩的基金。【原文：Investors are leaving exchange-traded funds tied to specific themes, such as artificial intelligence and video gaming, as they flock to funds linked to broad stock-market benchmarks that are hitting record highs.】

item.title: 英国房地产大甩卖考验低迷后的市场胃口
item.description: 英国的商业地产市场在经历了 "大瘟疫 "后的冰冻期后，正在恢复生机，尽管价格基本上要低得多。【原文：Britain's commercial property market is returning to life after its post-pandemic freeze, albeit largely at much lower prices.】

item.title: 早间竞价：债券和黄金进入美国大选日倒计时
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 在创纪录的 33 亿美元首次公开募股后，现代印度公司股价在首次交易中下跌 2
item.description: 现代汽车印度公司的股票周二首次上市下跌了 2%，此前散户投资者对该公司有史以来规模最大的首次公开募股反应平平。【原文：Hyundai Motor India's shares fell 2% in their market debut on Tuesday, after a tepid response from retail investors to the country's largest ever initial public offering.】

item.title: 汇丰任命帕姆-考尔为首位女性首席财务官，并宣布重组
item.description: 汇丰控股（HSBC Holdings）周二任命内部人士帕姆-考尔（Pam Kaur）为其首位女性财务总监，接替今年早些时候就任首席执行官的乔治-埃尔德里（Georges Elhedery），并宣布进行重组，将银行精简为四个业务部门。【原文：HSBC Holdings , named insider Pam Kaur as its first female finance chief on Tuesday, replacing Georges Elhedery who became CEO earlier this year, and announced a reorganization streamlining the bank into four business units.】

item.title: 涉及亿万富翁慧科首席执行官的澳大利亚诉讼案达成和解
item.description: 一份法庭文件显示，物流软件制造商慧科（WiseTech）的澳大利亚首席执行官与一名被当地媒体报道为其前度情人的女性之间的法律纠纷已经和解，从而结束了这一打击公司股价的事件。【原文：A legal battle between the Australian CEO of logistics software maker WiseTech and a woman reported by local media to be his former lover has been settled, a court filing showed, ending a saga which has punished the company's share price.】

item.title: 美国大选在即，债券下滑，股市下跌
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市转跌，美元站上数月高位，债券的大幅抛售和黄金的跳涨表明，投资者正在美国大选前缩手缩脚。【原文：Asian stocks turned lower and the dollar stood by multi-month peaks on Tuesday as a sharp sell-off in bonds and a jump in gold suggested investors are hunkering down ahead of the U.S. election.】

item.title: 受美国利率观点和大选影响，美元持稳于八月高点
item.description: 周二，美元坚守两个半月高位，原因是市场预期美联储将采取有节制的降息措施，而即将到来的美国大选中的激烈争夺也令投资者惶恐不安。【原文：The U.S. dollar clung to a two-and-half-month high on Tuesday on expectations the Federal Reserve will take a measured approach to interest rate cuts, while a close battle in the upcoming U.S. election kept investors on edge.】

item.title: 油价削减中东战争风险收益，中国需求仍令人担忧
item.description: 由于美国最高外交官再次努力推动中东停火，以及世界第一大石油进口国中国的需求放缓继续拖累市场，周二油价下跌，收窄了前一天近2%的涨幅。【原文：Oil prices fell on Tuesday, paring the previous day's nearly 2% rise as the top U.S. diplomat renewed efforts to push for a ceasefire in the Middle East, and as slow demand in China, the world's top oil importer, continued to weigh on the market.】

item.title: 电脑配件制造商罗技上调全年业绩展望
item.description: 电脑键盘和鼠标制造商罗技国际公司周二表示，由于第二季度表现强劲，公司上调了全年业绩展望。【原文：Logitech International raised its full-year outlook after a strong performance in the second quarter, the computer keyboard and mouse maker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 韩国经济可能在第三季度恢复增长
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，韩国经济在上一季度出现轻微萎缩后，很可能在下一季度恢复增长，这要归功于出口带动的经济扩张，抵消了借贷成本上升对国内需求的挤压。【原文：The South Korean economy likely returned to growth last quarter after a mild contraction in the prior quarter thanks to an export-led expansion that offset higher borrowing costs squeezing domestic demand, a Reuters poll found.】

item.title: 中国 9 月青年失业率为 17.6%，8 月为 18.8%
item.description: 中国统计局周二公布的数据显示，中国 9 月份除大学生以外的 16-24 岁人口调查失业率为 17.6%，而 8 月份为 18.8%。【原文：China's September survey-based jobless rate among 16-24 year-olds excluding college students stood at 17.6% compared with 18.8% in August, according to data released by the country's statistics bureau on Tuesday.】

item.title: 面对债权人的反对，埃利奥特为 Citgo 的报价辩护
item.description: 对冲基金埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）周一向法院施压，要求法院不要搁置其对 Citgo Petroleum 的竞购，称这家委内瑞拉所有的炼油公司的资产 "正在贬值"，债权人不会从其他公司那里得到更好的出价。【原文：Hedge fund Elliott Investment Management on Monday pressed a court not to hold up its bid for Citgo Petroleum, saying the Venezuela-owned oil refiner's assets "are deteriorating in value" and creditors will not get a better offer from others.】

item.title: 富士软的第一大股东确认支持 KKR 的收购要约
item.description: 富士软公司的第一大股东周二确认支持 KKR 对这家日本软件开发商的竞购，该竞购是全球最大的两家私募股权公司 40 亿美元收购战的焦点。【原文：Fuji Soft's top shareholder on Tuesday confirmed its support for KKR's bid for the Japanese software developer at the centre of a $4 billion takeover battle between two of the world's biggest private equity firms.】

item.title: 戴利表示，美联储需要继续降息
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周一表示，她没有看到任何迹象表明美国央行会停止降息，因为利率 "绝对 "仍然很高，足以抑制经济。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly on Monday said she has not seen anything to suggest the U.S. central bank would stop cutting interest rates, which are "absolutely" still high enough that they are restraining the economy.】
